text: Beckton DLR station is the eastern terminus of the Beckton branch of the Docklands Light Railway (DLR) in the Docklands area of east London. The DLR branch from Poplar was opened on 28 March 1994. ==Gallery== Image:Beckton stn London bound.JPG|Looking east (actually towards London, due to loop) Image:Beckton stn buffers.JPG|Looking west towards buffers Image:Beckton stn signage.JPG|Signage on platform Image:Beckton._-_geograph.org.uk_-_105123.jpg|Train calling at platform 1, not normally used off-peak (date: Nov. 2006 - note older all-white signage) ==Other websites== *Docklands Light Railway website - Beckton station page Category:Docklands Light Railway stations in the London Borough of Newham Category:London Travelcard zone 3
title: Beckton DLR station
